body:
It's also possible doing that

SomeController:

$state.go(someState, {
 'itemId'   : item._id,
 'itemName' : item.title
});

SoemRoute function someRoute($stateProvider) {

    $stateProvider
      .state('someState', {
        url : '/:itemName',
        params : {
          'itemId' : null //hides itemId param
        }
      });
}

Output: .../itemnumber1
title: Possible to hide some parameters in URL with Angular UI Router?
